p: The experiment was carried out for 60 days at the Animal Science Institute (IZ), Ribeirão Preto City, Sao Paulo State, Brazil (21° 10’41.08 "S and 47° 50’45.43" W), with the first fourteen days being an adaptation period. The maximum and minimum temperature averages recorded in the period were 31.6 °C and 18.0 °C, respectively (mean rainfall: 3.50 mm).
